#sidebar Sidebar

== _class_ !CssAtKeyframesStartToken _extends_ [ApiTokensACssToken aCssToken] ==
This [ApiTokensACssToken aCssToken] represents the start of a @keyframes at-rule block.
{{{
@keyframes "myName" {...
}}}
----

=== Properties ===
==== _public_ `string` $Name = "" ====
Name of the animation.
----

=== Methods ===
==== `void` _public_ __construct(`string` $name) ====
Constructor setting the name of the token.
 * `string` $name : Name of the animation
 * *Returns:* `string`
----

==== `string` _public_ __toString() ====
Implements [ApiTokensACssToken aCssToken::__toString()] and return the token as string.
 * *Returns:* `string`
----
